Package org.cesecore.roles.management

Interface RoleSessionLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RoleSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleSessionBean
    public interface RoleSessionLocal
extends RoleSession
    Local interface for Role management operations.
    Version:
    $Id: RoleSessionLocal.java 25642 2017-04-03 16:27:48Z jeklund $

    • Method Detail

      • assertAuthorizedToRoleMembers

        void assertAuthorizedToRoleMembers​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                   int roleId,
                                   boolean requireEditAccess)
                            throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Checks if the administrator is allowed to add/edit/remove role members from role with the given ID. Note that role member objects may reference a CA also, which must be checked for access as well.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - Auth token
        roleId - ID
        requireEditAccess - bool
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if access denied

      • getRolesAuthenticationTokenIsMemberOf

        List<Role> getRolesAuthenticationTokenIsMemberOf​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken)
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        Returns:
        a List of Roles the caller is a member of (without taking nesting into account)

      • getAuthorizedRolesWithAccessToResource

        List<Role> getAuthorizedRolesWithAccessToResource​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                                  String resource)
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        resource - resource
        Returns:
        a list of all Roles that have access to the resource and the caller is allowed to see

      • updateCaId

        boolean updateCaId​(int caIdOld,
                   int caIdNew,
                   boolean keepOldAccessRule,
                   boolean updateRoleMembers)
        Update Role access rules and optionally any RoleMember relating to the CA ID. Authorization to perform this operation should be checked by the caller and implied by the type of operation.
        Parameters:
        caIdOld - Old ID
        caIdNew - new ID
        keepOldAccessRule - when true, the /ca/(caIdOld)/ rule will be kept as well.
        updateRoleMembers - update the RoleMember.tokenIssuerId for members issued by this CA
        Returns:
        bool

      • assertNonImportantRoleMembership

        void assertNonImportantRoleMembership​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                      int roleId)
                               throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - Token
        roleId - ID
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if changing this role would affect the access granted to the specified authenticationToken.
